title: Why is it so hard to last hit w/ aurelion sol??
body:
Aurelion sol more like requeza //american dragon....sooo if you are having a tiny issue playing or mastering aurelion sol then ur in luck.(or are you).
As 
you all know aurelion sol is preety hard to last hit with and  am i here to help you and tell you how playing aurelion sol will get a lot easyer.er.er.er.wtf
so all you have to do is 
step1.go in to google
step2.go on to youtube
step3.type in american dragon (full series)
step4.watch the whole series 
step5.then go back on LoL ....
step6.( MEME)..

replies.body: Better way to learn aurelion. Learn the geometry of circles.
